text: Francis Joseph "Frank" Beaty (May 23, 1919 – November 26, 1985) was an American professional basketball player. He played for the Rochester Royals in the National Basketball League for six games during the 1946–47 season and averaged 0.2 points per game. ==References== ==External links== *RIT Hall of Fame profile Category:1919 births Category:1985 deaths Category:American naval personnel of World War II Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from New York (state) Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:People from Greece, New York Category:RIT Tigers men's basketball players Category:Rochester Royals players
title: Frank Beaty
